SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_RATECHANGE_RESPONSES_FROMITEMLISTXML
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Returns the ratechange response data from Scanner XML output
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_RATECHANGE_RESPONSES_FROMITEMLISTXML( @ITEMLISTXML xml = null ) returns table as -- do work here and return a value return (SELECT T.c.value('(RATEINCREASE)[1]','bit') AS 'RATEINCREASE', T.c.value('(NEWRGAMOUNT)[1]','money') AS 'NEWRGAMOUNT', T.c.value('(REVENUELOOKUPID)[1]','nvarchar(100)') AS 'REVENUELOOKUPID', T.c.value('(CHILDLOOKUPID)[1]','nvarchar(100)') AS 'CHILDLOOKUPID', T.c.value('(SPONSORLOOKUPID)[1]','nvarchar(100)') AS 'SPONSORLOOKUPID', T.c.value('(SPONSORSHIPID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'SPONSORSHIPID', T.c.value('(CURRENTRGAMOUNT)[1]','money') AS 'CURRENTRGAMOUNT', T.c.value('(SPONSORID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'SPONSORID' FROM @ITEMLISTXML.nodes('/RATECHANGE/ITEM') T(c) )
